summary: An Ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3737 for the improvement of East Alder Street, from 27th Avenue to 29th Avenue; by grading and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 45878, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
